service.sql: select convert(varchar(200), company_name) cn, sum(not_tax_inclusive_price) tip, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) gp, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_price * win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount), 0) wbssp, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) wbssa, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_price * win_bid_ele_copper_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount), 0) wbecp, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount) wbeca, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_process_cost) wbecpc, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_price * win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount), 0) wbiop, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) wbioa, sum(win_bid_cardboard_price * win_bid_cardboard_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount), 0) wbcp, sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount) wbca, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_price * win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount), 0) wbrsp, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) wbrsa, sum(win_bid_other_material_cost) wbomc, sum(labour_cost) lc, sum(manufacturing_cost) mc, sum(win_bid_cost) wbc from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS where model = ${productModel} group by company_name

select '合计', sum(not_tax_inclusive_price) tip, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) gp, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_price * win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount), 0) wbssp, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) wbssa, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_price * win_bid_ele_copper_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount), 0) wbecp, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount) wbeca, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_process_cost) wbecpc, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_price * win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount), 0) wbiop, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) wbioa, sum(win_bid_cardboard_price * win_bid_cardboard_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount), 0) wbcp, sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount) wbca, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_price * win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) / nullif(sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount), 0) wbrsp, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) wbrsa, sum(win_bid_other_material_cost) wbomc, sum(labour_cost) lc, sum(manufacturing_cost) mc, sum(win_bid_cost) wbc from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS where model = ${productModel}

controller.list: 单位,合同金额,毛利额,毛利率,硅钢,硅钢,电解铜,电解铜,电解铜,变压器油,变压器油,纸板,纸板,钢材,钢材,其他材料成本,人工费用,制造费用,材料成本总计
单位,合同金额,毛利额,毛利率,单价,用量,单价,用量,加工费,单价,用量,,单价,用量,单价,用量,其他材料成本,人工费用,制造费用,材料成本总计

service.sql: select row_number() over(order by (select 0)) AS ROWNUM, convert(varchar(200), model) md from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS where company_name in ${dwmcs}
